title: Did Ibn Taymiyyah say Furqan is not a good name?
transcript:
Irfan says Ibn Tamiyyah says 'Furqan' is 
not a good name. I don't know about what   Ibn Tamiyyah said in this regard but generally 
speaking, ibn qayyim mentioned this and he said   that it is disliked to give names with the names 
of surahs of the Quran such as taha yasin Ha-Mmeen and scholars said that Furqan 
is one of the surahs of   the Quran so it is 'disliked' 
is it haram no it's not haram.
